name: Build-enviroment
tagline: This sets-up the oe-alliance build environment.
body:
Update & Makefiles

`make update`

DM800SE V2 build

`MACHINE=dm800sev2 DISTRO=openatv make image`

Sti7162 image build

`MACHINE=sparkone DISTRO=openatv make image`
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
